Class UserCommandParser

java.lang.Object
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.parser.UserCommandParser
public final class UserCommandParser extends Object
Parses user commands and informs a specified WorldController instance of its results. For example, the String "go north" causes the WorldController.travel(Direction) method to be invoked.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserCommandParser

      public UserCommandParser(WorldController controller, IParserObserver observer)
      Constructs a text command parser with the specified observer and WorldController. The controller is sent commands that affect the World (or could), while the observer is sent error messages and output from commands that only query the world, in particular those expected to be unique to a text-based interface.
      Parameters:
      controller - a non-null controller for this parser to invoke once it understands the user's game command.
      observer - a non-null observer for this parser to send messages and query command output to

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public void parse(String command)
      Parses the user's command and sending appropriate messages to the WorldController. Once the users command is understood (i.e., parsed) a specific method is invoked on the controller. If the parser couldn't understand the user's command an error message is sent.
      Parameters:
      command - the users's command to the game.
